headline: Show HN: Learning Loop – The social network for learning
description:
Hi folks - We're building Learning Loop to organise specific knowledge and make it searchable, to make learning collaboratively and increasingly more efficient

Our first loop aims to decentralise valuable knowledge about starting and growing startups. Join the loop here: https://app.learningloop.org/loop/founders

we’re launching more loops in stages. To see the upcoming loops and get early access, visit https://www.learningloop.org/discover

Please let me know if you have any comments or suggestions on features to add
